name: Axe Beak
description:
Opportunistic Striker. If this monster moves at least 20 feet before attacking, it deals an extra 1d6 slashing damage.

Actions

Beak. Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d8 + 2 slashing damage.

name: Blink Dog
description:
Actions

Bite. Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d6 + 1 piercing damage.

Teleport (1/S). This monster magically teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, up to 40 feet to an unoccupied space it can see. Before or after teleporting, this monster can make one Bite attack.

name: Cockatrice
description:
Actions

Bite. Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 1d4 + 1 piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 11 CON saving throw against being magically petrified. On a failed save, the creature begins to turn to stone and is restrained. It must repeat the saving throw at the end of its next turn. On a success, the effect ends. On a failure, the creature is petrified for 1 turn.

name: Cultist
description:
Dark Devotion. This monster has advantage on saving throws against being charmed or frightened.

Actions

Scimitar. Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 1d6 + 1 slashing damage.

name: Flame Skull
description:
Illumination. This monster sheds bright light in a 15-foot radius and dim light for an additional 15 feet.

Magic Resistance. This monster has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Actions

Fire Ray. Ranged Spell Attack: +5 to hit, range 30 ft., one target. Hit: 2d6 fire damage.

name: Ghoul
description:
Actions

Claws. Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 2d4 + 2 slashing damage.

Paralyzing Touch. Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d6 + 2 necrotic damage. The target must make a DC 11 CON saving throw or be paralyzed for 1 minute. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

name: Mud Mephit
description:
Death Burst. When this monster dies, it explodes in a burst of sticky mud. Each Medium or smaller creature within 5 feet of it must succeed on a DC 11 DEX saving throw or be restrained until the end of the creature's next turn.

Actions

Claw. Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d6 + 1 slashing damage.

Mud Breath (1/S). This monster spits sticky mud at a target within 15 feet. The target must make a DC 11 DEX saving throw or have its movement speed halved until the end of its next turn.

name: Pixie
description:
Innate Magic. When this monster is summoned, choose one:
  • This monster casts Minor Invisibility on itself and cannot be targeted until it attacks or uses an ability.
  • A target within 30 feet must make a DC 11 WIS saving throw or be charmed until the start of your next turn.
Actions

Pixie Dust. Ranged Magic Attack: +4 to hit, range 15 ft., one target. Hit: 1d4 + 1 force damage, and the target must make a DC 11 CON saving throw or be dazed and lose reactions until the end of its next turn.

Fey Trickster (1/S). The target must make a DC 12 INT saving throw or have disadvantage on its next attack roll.

name: Shadow
description:
Shadow Stealth. While in dim light or darkness, this monster can take the Hide action as a bonus action.

Sunlight Weakness. While in sunlight, this monster has disadvantage on attack rolls, ability checks, and saving throws.

Actions

Strength Drain. Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 2d6 + 2 necrotic damage, and the target's STR score is reduced by 1d4 for 2 turns.

name: Skeleton
description:
Actions

Shortsword. Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d6 + 2 piercing damage.

Shortbow. Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. Hit: 1d6 + 2 piercing damage.

name: Smoke Mephit
description:
Death Burst. When this monster dies, it leaves behind a cloud of smoke that fills a 5-foot-radius sphere centered on its space. The sphere is heavily obscured. Wind disperses the cloud, which otherwise lasts for 1 minute.

Actions

Claw. Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d6 + 1 slashing damage.

Cinder Breath (1/S). This monster exhales a 15-foot cone of smoldering ash. Creatures in the area must make a DC 11 DEX saving throw or take 1d6 fire damage and have disadvantage on their next attack roll.

name: Wolf
description:
Pack Tactics. This monster has advantage on attack rolls against a creature if at least one of the monster's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

Actions

Bite. Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 2d4 + 2 piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 11 STR saving throw or be knocked prone.

name: Zombie
description:
Undead Fortitude. If damage reduces this monster to 0 hit points, it must make a CON saving throw with a DC of 5 + the damage taken, unless the damage is radiant or from a critical hit. On a success, this monster drops to 1 hit point instead.

Actions

Slam. Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d6 + 1 bludgeoning damage.

name: Animated Armor
description:
Living Armor. This monster has resistance to non-magical attacks.

Sentinel Defense. When an enemy moves within 5 feet of this monster, it must make a DC 13 STR saving throw or have its movement reduced to 0 until the end of the turn.

Actions

Heavy Slam. Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 2d6 + 3 bludgeoning damage.

name: Ankheg
description:
Actions

Bite. Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 2d6 + 4 piercing damage. The target must make a DC 12 STR saving throw or be grappled.

Acid Spray (1/S). This monster spits acid in a 15 foot line, provided that it has no creature grappled. Each creature in the area must make a DC 13 DEX saving throw, taking 3d6 acid damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

name: Banshee
description:
Incorporeal Movement. This monster can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. It takes 1d10 force damage if she ends her turn inside an object.

Actions

Corrupting Touch. Melee Spell Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 3d6 necrotic damage.

Wail of the Dead (1/S). All non-Undead creatures within 10 feet must make a DC 14 CON saving throw. On a failure, they take 4d6 necrotic damage and are frightened until the end of their next turn. On a success, they take half as much damage and are not frightened.

name: Blue Dragon Wyrmling
description:
Actions

Bite. Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d10 + 3 piercing damage plus 1d6 lightning damage.

Lightning Breath (1/S). This monster exhales lightning in a 20-foot line. Each creature in that line must make a DC 13 DEX saving throw, taking 4d6 lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

name: Bulette
description:
Burrowing Terror. If this monster moves at least 15 feet underground before attacking, its next attack deals an extra 1d8 damage.

Actions

Bite. Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 2d10 + 4 piercing damage.

Deadly Leap. This monster leaps up to 20 feet and crashes down in a 10-foot radius. All creatures in the area must make a DC 14 DEX saving throw or take 3d6 bludgeoning damage and be knocked prone. On a successful save, the creature takes half the damage, isn't knocked prone, and is instead pushed 5 feet out of this monster's space.

name: Cave Bear
description:
Ferocious Charge. If this monster moves at least 10 feet before attacking, its first attack deals an extra 1d8 damage, and the target must make a DC 13 STR saving throw or be knocked prone.

Actions

Multiattack (1/S). This monster makes a Bite attack and a Claw attack.

Bite. Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 2d6 + 4 piercing damage.

Claws. Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 2d8 + 4 slashing damage.

name: Chuul
description:
Amphibious. This monster can breathe air and water.

Brutal Claws. This monster can attack enemies that it has grappled, and it deals an extra 2d8 damage to those enemies.

Actions

Pincer. Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 2d6 + 4 bludgeoning damage.

Tentacles. This monster attempts to grapple a creature within 10 feet. The target must make a DC 14 STR saving throw or be restrained until the start of its next turn.

name: Cult High Priest
description:
Dark Blessing. Cultist monsters under your control gain +3 to attack rolls.

Actions

Sacrificial Dagger. Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d8 + 2 slashing damage.

Blood Offering (1/S). Sacrifice one of your monsters. If you sacrificed an R rarity monster, heal 1d10 HP and draw a card. If you sacrificed an SR rarity monster, heal 3d8 HP and draw a card. If you sacrificed an SSR rarity monster, heal 6d6 HP and draw 2 cards.

name: Fire Elemental
description:
Illumination. This monster sheds bright light in a 30-foot radius and dim light in an additional 30 feet.

Water Susceptibility. For every 5 feet this monster moves in water, or for every gallon of water splashed on it, it takes 1 cold damage.

Actions

Multiattack (1/S). This monster makes two Touch attacks.

Touch. Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 2d6 + 3 fire damage. If the target is a creature or a flammable object, it ignites. Until a creature takes an action to douse the fire, the target takes 1d10 fire damage at the start of each of its turns.

name: Gelatinous Cube
description:
Ooze Cube. This monster takes up its entire space. Other creatures can enter the space, but a creature that does so is subjected to Engulf and has disadvantage on the saving throw.

Actions

Pseudopod. Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 3d6 acid damage.

Engulf. Whenever this monster enters a creature's space, the creature must make a DC 12 DEX saving throw. On a successful save, the creature can choose to be pushed 5 feet back or to the side of this monster. A creature that chooses not to be pushed suffers the consequences of a failed saving throw. On a failed save, this monster enters the creature's space, and the creature takes 3d6 acid damage and is engulfed. The engulfed creature can't breathe, is restrained, and takes 6d6 acid damage at the start of each of the cube's turns. When this monster moves, the engulfed creature moves with it. An engulfed creature can try to escape by taking an action to make a DC 12 STR check. On a success, the creature escapes and enters a space of its choice within 5 feet of this monster.

name: Giant Eagle
description:
Keen Sight. This monster has advantage on Perception checks that rely on sight.

Actions

Multiattack (1/S). This monster a Beak attack and a Talon attack.

Beak. Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d6 + 3 piercing damage.

Talons. Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 2d6 + 3 slashing damage.

name: Grick
description:
Stone Camouflage. This monster has advantage on Stealth checks made to hide in rocky terrain.

Actions

Multiattack (1/S). This monster makes a Tentacle and a Beak attack.

Tentacles. Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 2d6 + 2 slashing damage.

Beak. Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d6 + 2 piercing damage.

name: Harpy
description:
Actions

Claws. Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 2d6 + 3 slashing damage.

Luring Song. This monster sings a magical melody. Choose an enemy within 30 feet. It must make a DC 14 WIS saving throw or be charmed by this monster until the end of its next turn. The charmed creature must move toward this monster and cannot take reactions.

name: Lizardfolk Shaman
description:
Tribal Wisdom. When you summon a Beast or Humanoid monster, you may draw a card.

Actions

Staff. Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d6 + 2 bludgeoning damage.

Primal Guidance (1/S). Choose one of your monsters on the field. Until the start of your next turn, it gains +1 AC and advantage on saving throws against magic.

name: Merrow
description:
Amphibious. This monster can breathe air and water.

Aquatic Hunter. While this monster is in water, it and any allied creatures within 10 feet gain advantage on attack rolls.

Actions

Claws. Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 2d4 + 4 slashing damage.

Harpoon. Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 2d6 + 4 piercing damage. If the target is a Huge or smaller creature, it must succeed on a STR contest against this monster or be pulled up to 20 feet toward this monster.

name: Minotaur
description:
Charge. If this monster moves at least 10 feet straight toward a target and then makes a melee attack, the target must make a DC 14 STR saving throw or be pushed 10 feet back and take an extra 2d6 bludgeoning damage.

Labyrinthine Fury. his monster has advantage on attack rolls against creatures that are within 10 feet of a wall or obstacle.

Actions

Gore. Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 2d8 + 4 piercing damage.

name: Mummy
description:
Dreadful Presence. Enemy creatures within 10 feet of this monster have disadvantage on saving throws against being frightened.

Actions

Rotting Fist. Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 3d6 necrotic damage. The target must make a DC 14 CON saving throw or its maximum HP is reduced by an amount equal to the necrotic damage taken.

Healing Curse (1/S). Choose an enemy creature within 30 feet of this monster. It must make a DC 14 WIS saving throw or take 2d6 necrotic damage and be cursed until the end of its next turn. While cursed, the target has disadvantage on attack rolls and cannot regain HP.

name: Owlbear
description:
Keen Sight and Smell. This monster has advantage on Perception checks that rely on sight or smell.

Monstrous Frenzy. If this monster is reduced to half HP, it gains advantage on attack rolls until the end of its next turn.

Actions

Multiattack (1/S). This monster makes a Beak attack and a Claw attack.

Beak. Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 1d10 + 5 piercing damage.

Claws. Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 2d8 + 5 slashing damage.

name: Phase Spider
description:
Ethereal Jaunt. As a bonus action, this monster can can shift into the Ethereal Plane, moving through creatures and objects without provoking opportunity attacks.

Spider Climb. This monster can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

Web Walker. This monster ignores movement restrictions caused by webbing.

Actions

Bite. Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 2d6 + 4 piercing damage plus 2d6 poison damage. The target must make a DC 14 CON saving throw or be poisoned for 1 minute (can repeat save at the end of each of its turns).

name: Winter Wolf
description:
Pack Tactics. This monster has advantage on attack rolls against a creature if at least one of the monster's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

Snow Camouflage. This monster has advantage on Stealth checks made to hide in snowy terrain.

Actions

Bite. Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 2d6 + 4 piercing damage plus 1d6 cold damage.

Cold Breath (1/S). Exhales a 15-foot cone of freezing cold. Each creature in the area must make a DC 14 DEX saving throw or take 3d6 cold damage and have their movement speed halved until the end of their next turn.

name: Adult Black Dragon
description:
Amphibious. This monster can breathe air and water.

Actions

Multiattack (1/S). This monster makes a Bite attack and two Claw attacks.

Bite. Melee Weapon Attack: +11 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 2d10 + 6 piercing damage plus 1d8 acid damage.

Claw. Melee Weapon Attack: +11 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 2d6 + 6 slashing damage.

Acid Breath (1/S). This monster exhales acid in a 30-foot line. Each creature in that line must make a DC 18 DEX saving throw, taking 12d8 acid damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

name: Archmage
description:
Spellcasting. This monster can use its action to cast any spell played from your hand. Use INT spell save DC 17 and +9 to hit with spell attacks for any spells used from this monster.

Preparations. This monster casts Mage Armor, Stoneskin, and Mind Blank on itself when summoned.

Magic Resistance. This monster has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Actions

Dagger. Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 1d4 + 2 piercing damage.

name: Iron Golem
description:
Fire Absorption. Whenever this monster is subjected to fire damage, it takes no damage and instead regains a number of hit points equal to the fire damage dealt.

Immutable Form. This monster is immune to all conditions except blinded, deafened, and paralyzed.

Actions

Heavy Slam. Melee Weapon Attack: +12 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 3d10 + 6 bludgeoning damage. The target must make a DC 17 STR saving throw or be knocked prone.

Poison Breath (1/S). Exhales poisonous gas in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in the area must make a DC 16 CON saving throw or take 5d6 poison damage and become poisoned until the end of its next turn.

name: Lich
description:
Spellcasting. This monster can use its action to cast any spell played from your hand. Use INT spell save DC 20 and +12 to hit with spell attacks for any spells used from this monster.

Turn Resistance. This monster has advantage on saving throws against any effect that turns undead.

Actions

Paralyzing Touch. Melee Spell Attack: +12 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 3d6 cold damage. The target must succeed on a DC 18 CON saving throw or be paralyzed for 1 minute. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

Cantrip. This monster casts a cantrip of your choice from the Wizard spell list.

name: Roc
description:
Keen Sight. This monster has advantage on Perception checks that rely on sight.

Crushing Talons. When this monster makes a melee attack, it can choose to grapple the target. If the grapple succeeds, the target is lifted into the air. At the start of each of this monster's turns, the grappled target takes 2d6 bludgeoning damage until released.

Actions

Talons. Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 4d10 + 6 slashing damage.

Sonic Screech (1/S). Lets out a deafening screech. All enemies within 30 feet must make a DC 17 CON saving throw or take 5d6 thunder damage and be deafened until the end of their next turn. On a successful save, they take half damage and are not deafened.

name: Stone Golem
description:
Immutable Form. This monster is immune to being charmed, paralyzed, or petrified. It also has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Stoneform Aura. Allied Construct monsters within 10 feet of this monster gain resistance to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage.

Actions

Pounding Fists. Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4d10 + 6 bludgeoning damage.

Trample (1/S). Choose one enemy creature within 15 feet of this monster. This monster moves to the target and then makes a melee attack. If it hits, the target is knocked prone.

name: Treant
description:
Siege Monster. This monster deals double damage to objects and structures.

Actions

Crushing Slam. Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 3d6 + 6 bludgeoning damage.

Entangling Roots (1/S). Choose one enemy creature within 15 feet of this monster. The target must make a DC 16 STR saving throw or be restrained by the roots until the end of its next turn.

Ancient Guardian (1/S). Allied Plant and Beast monsters within 15 feet of this monster gain resistance to all damage types until the start of its next turn.

name: Acid Arrow
description: A shimmering green arrow streaks toward a target within range and bursts in a spray of acid. Make a ranged spell attack against the target. On a hit, the target takes 4d4 acid damage immediately and 2d4 acid damage at the end of its next turn. On a miss, the arrow splashes the target with acid for half as much of the initial damage and no damage at the end of its next turn.

name: Bane
description: Up to three creatures of your choice that you can see within 30 feet must make CHA saving throws. Whenever a target that fails this saving throw makes an attack roll or a saving throw before the spell ends, the target must roll a d4 and subtract the number rolled from the attack roll or saving throw.

name: Bless
description: You bless up to three creatures of your choice within 30 feet. Whenever a target makes an attack roll or a saving throw before the spell ends, the target can roll a d4 and add the number rolled to the attack roll or saving throw.

name: Blindness/Deafness
description: You can blind or deafen a foe. Choose one creature that you can see within range to make a CON saving throw. If it fails, the target is either blinded or deafened (your choice) for 1 minute. At the end of each of its turns, the target can make a CON saving throw. On a success, the spell ends.

name: Burning Hands
description:
A thin sheet of flames shoots forth from your outstretched fingertips. Each creature in a 15-foot cone must make a DEX saving throw. A creature takes 3d6 fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

The fire ignites any flammable objects in the area that aren't being worn or carried.

name: Charm Person
description: A humanoid you see within range must make a WIS saving throw, and does so with advantage if you or your companions are fighting it. If it fails the saving throw, it is charmed by you until the spell ends or until you or your companions do anything harmful to it. The charmed creature regards you as a friendly acquaintance. When the spell ends, the creature knows it was charmed by you.

name: Chromatic Orb
description: You hurl a sphere of energy at a creature that you can see within range. You choose acid, cold, fire, lightning, poison, or thunder for the type of orb you create, and then make a ranged spell attack against the target. If the attack hits, the creature takes 3d8 damage of the type you chose.

name: Cure Wounds
description: A creature you touch regains a number of hit points equal to 1d8 + your spellcasting ability modifier. This spell has no effect on undead or constructs.

name: Detect Magic
description: For 10 minutes, you sense the presence of magic within 30 feet of you. If you sense magic in this way, you can use your action to see a faint aura around any visible creature or object in the area that bears magic, and you learn its school of magic, if any.

name: Earth Tremor
description: You cause a tremor in the ground within 10 feet. Each creature other than you in that area must make a DEX saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 1d6 bludgeoning damage and is knocked prone. If the ground in that area is loose earth or stone, it becomes difficult terrain until cleared.

name: Earthbind
description: Choose one creature you can see within 300 feet. Yellow strips of magical energy loop around the creature. The target must succeed on a STR saving throw, or its flying speed (if any) is reduced to 0 feet for 1 minute. An airborne creature affected by this spell safely descends at 60 feet per round until it reaches the ground or the spell ends.

name: Feather Fall
description: Choose up to five falling creatures within 60 feet. A falling creature's rate of descent slows to 60 feet per round for 1 minute. If the creature lands before the spell ends, it takes no falling damage and can land on its feet, and the spell ends for that creature.

name: Grease
description:
Slick grease covers the ground in a 10-foot square centered on a point within 60 feet and turns it into difficult terrain for the duration.

When the grease appears, each creature standing in its area must succeed on a DEX saving throw or fall prone. A creature that enters the area or ends its turn there must also succeed on a DEX saving throw or fall prone.

name: Hold Person
description: Choose a humanoid that you can see within 60 feet. The target must succeed on a WIS saving throw or be paralyzed for 1 minute. At the end of each of its turns, the target can make another WIS saving throw. On a success, the spell ends on the target.

name: Magic Missile
description: You create four glowing darts of magical force. Each dart hits a creature of your choice that you can see within 120 feet. A dart deals 1d4 + 1 force damage to its target. The darts all strike simultaneously, and you can direct them to hit one creature or several.

name: Shield of Faith
description: A shimmering field appears and surrounds a creature of your choice within 60 feet, granting it a +2 bonus to AC for 10 minutes.

name: Mage Armor
description: You touch a willing creature who isn't wearing armor, and a protective magical force surrounds it until the spell ends. The target's base AC becomes 13 + its DEX modifier. The spell ends if the target dons armor or if you dismiss the spell as an action.

name: Web
description:
You conjure a mass of thick, sticky webbing at a point of your choice within 60 feet. The webs fill a 20-foot cube from that point for 1 hour. The webs are difficult terrain and lightly obscure their area.

If the webs aren't anchored between two solid masses or layered across a floor, wall, or ceiling, the conjured web collapses on itself, and the spell ends at the start of your next turn.

Each creature that starts its turn in the webs or that enters them during its turn must make a DEX saving throw. On a failed save, the creature is restrained as long as it remains in the webs or until it breaks free.

A creature restrained by the webs can use its action to make a STR check against your spell save DC. If it succeeds, it is no longer restrained.

The webs are flammable. Any webs exposed to fire burns away in 1 round, dealing 2d4 fire damage to any creature that starts its turn in the fire.

name: Banishment
description:
You attempt to send one creature that you can see within range to another plane of existence. The target must succeed on a CHA saving throw or be banished.

While banished the target is incapacitated. The target remains there until the spell ends or after 1 minute, at which point the target reappears in the space it left or in the nearest unoccupied space if that space is occupied.

name: Black Tentacles
description:
Squirming, ebony tentacles fill a 20-foot square on ground that you can see within 90 feet. For 1 minute, these tentacles turn the ground in the area into difficult terrain.

When a creature enters the affected area for the first time on a turn or starts its turn there, the creature must succeed on a DEX saving throw or take 3d6 bludgeoning damage and be restrained by the tentacles until the spell ends. A creature that starts its turn in the area and is already restrained by the tentacles takes 3d6 bludgeoning damage.

A creature restrained by the tentacles can use its action to make a STR or DEX check against your spell save DC. On a success, it frees itself.

name: Cone of Cold
description:
A blast of cold air erupts from your hands. Each creature in a 60-foot cone must make a CON saving throw. A creature takes 8d8 cold damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

A creature killed by this spell becomes a frozen statue until it thaws.

name: Fireball
description: A bright streak flashes from your pointing finger to a point you choose within 150 feet and then blossoms with a low roar into an explosion of flame. Each creature in a 20-foot-radius sphere centered on that point must make a DEX saving throw. A target takes 8d6 fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

name: Immolation
description:
Flames wreathe one creature you can see within 90 feet. The target must make a DEX saving throw. It takes 8d6 fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. On a failed save, the target also burns for 1 minute. The burning target sheds bright light in a 30-foot radius and dim light for an additional 30 feet. At the end of each of its turns, the target repeats the saving throw. It takes 4d6 fire damage on a failed save, and the spell ends on a successful one. These magical flames can't be extinguished by nonmagical means.

If damage from this spell kills a target, the target is turned to ash.

name: Insect Plague
description:
Swarming, biting locusts fill a 20-foot-radius sphere centered on a point you choose within 300 feet. The sphere spreads around corners. The sphere remains for 10 minutes, and its area is lightly obscured. The sphere's area is difficult terrain.

When the area appears, each creature in it must make a CON saving throw. A creature takes 4d10 piercing damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. A creature must also make this saving throw when it enters the spell's area for the first time on a turn or ends its turn there.

name: Lightning Bolt
description: A stroke of lightning forming a line 100 feet long and 5 feet wide blasts out from you in a direction you choose. Each creature in the line must make a DEX saving throw. A creature takes 8d6 lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. The lightning ignites flammable objects in the area that aren't being worn or carried.

name: Maelstrom
description: A swirling mass of 5-foot-deep water appears in a 30-foot radius centered on a point you can see within 120 feet. The point must be on the ground or in a body of water. After 1 minute or until the spell ends, that area is difficult terrain, and any creature that starts its turn there must succeed on a STR saving throw or take 6d6 bludgeoning damage and be pulled 10 feet toward the center.

name: Misty Step
description: Briefly surrounded by silvery mist, you teleport up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space that you can see.

name: Soul Drain
description: You sap the vitality from a creature, using it to restore your own strength. Choose one creature within range. The target must make a CON saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes 4d8 necrotic damage, and you regain hit points equal to half the damage dealt. On a successful save, the target takes half as much damage, and you regain no hit points.

name: Soul Shackles
description:
You bind a creature's soul with shadowy chains, hindering its ability to act. Choose one creature within 30 feet. The target must make a WIS saving throw. On a failed save, it is paralyzed until the end of its next turn. While paralyzed in this way, the target takes 2d6 necrotic damage at the start of each of its turns.

At the start of each of its turns, the target can make another WIS saving throw, ending the effect on a success.

name: Speak with Dead
description:
You grant the semblance of life and intelligence to a corpse of your choice within 10 feet, allowing it to answer the questions you pose. The corpse must still have a mouth and can't be undead. The spell fails if the corpse was the target of this spell within the last 10 days.

For 10 minutes, you can ask the corpse up to five questions. The corpse knows only what it knew in life, including the languages it knew. Answers are usually brief, cryptic, or repetitive, and the corpse is under no compulsion to offer a truthful answer if you are hostile to it or it recognizes you as an enemy. This spell doesn't return the creature's soul to its body, only its animating spirit. Thus, the corpse can't learn new information, doesn't comprehend anything that has happened since it died, and can't speculate about future events.

name: Stoneskin
description: This spell turns the flesh of a willing creature you touch as hard as stone. For 1 hour or until the spell ends, the target has resistance to non-magical bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage.

name: Chain Lightning
description:
You create a bolt of lightning that arcs toward a target of your choice that you can see within 150 feet. Three bolts then leap from that target to as many as three other targets, each of which must be within 30 feet of the first target. A target can be a creature or an object and can be targeted by only one of the bolts.

A target must make a DEX saving throw. The target takes 10d8 lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

name: Invulnerability
description: You are immune to all damage for 10 minutes or until the spell ends.

name: Meteor Swarm
description: Blazing orbs of fire plummet to the ground at four different points you can see within range. Each creature in a 40-foot-radius sphere centered on each point you choose must make a DEX saving throw. The sphere spreads around corners. A creature takes 20d6 fire damage and 20d6 bludgeoning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. A creature in the area of more than one fiery burst is affected only once. The spell damages objects in the area and ignites flammable objects that aren't being worn or carried.

name: Power Word Kill
description: You utter a word of power that can compel one creature you can see within 60 feet to die instantly. If the creature you choose has 100 hit points or fewer, it dies. Otherwise, the spell has no effect.

name: Prismatic Spray
description:
Eight multicolored rays of light flash from your hand. Each ray is a different color and has a different power and purpose. Each creature in a 60-foot cone must make a DEX saving throw. For each target, roll a d8 to determine which color ray affects it. On a 1-5 on the roll, the target takes 10d6 damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

1. Red. The target takes fire damage.

2. Orange. The target takes acid damage.

3. Yellow. The target takes lightning damage.

4. Green. The target takes poison damage.

5. Blue. The target takes cold damage.

6. Indigo. On a failed save, the target is restrained. It must then make a CON saving throw at the end of each of its turns. If it successfully saves three times, the spell ends. If it fails its save three times, it permanently turns to stone and is subjected to the petrified condition. The successes and failures don't need to be consecutive; keep track of both until the target collects three of a kind.

7. Violet. On a failed save, the target is blinded. It must then make a WIS saving throw at the start of your next turn. A successful save ends the blindness. If it fails that save, the creature is transported to another plane of existence of the GM's choosing and is no longer blinded.

8. Special. The target is struck by two rays. Roll twice more, rerolling any 8.

name: Blood Price
description: Reduce the damage taken by half. Then, deal 1d8 necrotic damage to an enemy within 10 feet.

name: Ferocious Roar
description: The beast lets out a terrifying roar. The attacker must make a DC 12 WIS saving throw or become Frightened until the end of its next turn.
reactionTrigger: A Beast monster under your control takes damage

name: Hellish Rebuke
description: You point your finger, and the creature that damaged you is momentarily surrounded by hellish flames. The creature must make a DEX saving throw. It takes 2d10 fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
reactionTrigger: You or an ally are damaged by a creature within 60 feet of them that they can see

name: Pit Trap
description: The creature that moved near you falls into a spiked pit trap. The creature must make a DEX saving throw. It takes 2d8 piercing damage and its movement speed is reduced to 0 on a failed save, or half as much damage and no movement speed reduction on a successful one.
reactionTrigger: A creature moves within 10 feet of you or an ally

name: Poison Dart Trap
description: The creature that moved near you succumbs to a volley of poisonous darts. The creature must make a DEX saving throw. It takes 1d4 piercing damage, 1d4 poison damage, and is Poisoned on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one and is not Poisoned.
reactionTrigger: A creature moves within 10 feet of you or an ally

name: Reroll
description: The player that just rolled rerolls a die involved in the roll.

name: Shield
description: An invisible barrier of magical force appears and protects the target. Until the start of your next turn, the target has a +5 bonus to AC, including against the triggering attack, and takes no damage from magic missile.
reactionTrigger: You or an ally is hit by an attack or targeted by magic missiles

name: Counterspell
description: You attempt to interrupt a creature in the process of casting a spell. If the creature is casting a spell of 3rd level or lower, its spell fails and has no effect. If it is casting a spell of 4th level or higher, make an ability check using your spellcasting ability. The DC equals 10 + the spell's level. On a success, the creature's spell fails and has no effect.
reactionTrigger: A creature within 60 feet of you casts a spell

name: Dimensional Blockage
description: The connection is severed and the teleportation fails, dealing 4d8 force damage to the creature.
reactionTrigger: A creature teleports or moves between planes

name: Lightning Reflexes
description: The target of this reaction automatically succeeds on the DEX saving throw. This card can only target one creature, and must be activated before the DEX saving throw is rolled.
reactionTrigger: You or an ally are forced to make a DEX saving throw

name: Necromancer's Gravecall
description: The words of the Necromancer flow through you and command your servant to continue its fight. The creature that was just killed is revived. If the creature is of SR rarity, then it is revived with half of its maximum HP.
reactionTrigger: An SR rarity or lower Undead monster on the field under your control is killed

name: Redirect
description: Your mastery over the arcane lets you alter the course of spells targeted at you. If the spell is of 5th level or lower you alter its course and can send it back to the initial caster as if it were your own spell; having to make a spell attack roll or the initial caster now making the saving throw. If the spell if of 6th level or higher, make an ability check using your spellcasting ability with a DC equal to 10 + the spell's level. On a success, you alter the spell's course. On a failure, the spell maintains its original course towards affecting you.
reactionTrigger: You or an ally is hit by a ranged attack or spell

name: Siphon Life
description: You siphon the life of your own wicked servants. The monster that was just attacked receives 1d8 necrotic damage and you draw a card.
reactionTrigger: A monster on the field under your control is hit by an attack

name: Twisted Fate
description: The target of this reaction must reroll the saving throw.
reactionTrigger: A creature succeeds on a saving throw

name: Demonic Contract
description: Your contract with the demons of the underworld must be carried out. Instead of dying, you revive with 1 HP. At the start of your next turn, you take 3d10 necrotic damage.

name: Phoenix Rebirth
description: The creature is engulfed in flames, only to rise again, reborn from the ashes. Instead of being killed, it is restored to half of its maximum HP. Additionally, at the start of its next turn, it deals 3d6 fire damage to all enemies within 10 feet.
reactionTrigger: The HP of a creature within 30 feet of you reduces to 0

name: Arcane Recharge
description: Shuffle up to 2 Spell cards from your discard pile into your deck.

name: Bardic Inspiration
description: Choose up to three of your monsters on the field. Add 1d4 to each monsters' next attack roll, ability check, or saving throw.

name: Call of the Beast
description: Search your deck for a Beast monster card and add it your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward. You can only play this card if you have a Beast monster on the field.

name: Cunning Action
description: Choose one of your monsters on the field. During this turn, that monster may take the Dash, Disengage, or Hide action as a bonus action.

name: Eye of the Void
description: Look at the top 3 cards of your deck. You may discard one.

name: Law of Equivalent Exchange
description: Discard a card from your hand. Then, draw 1 card from your deck.

name: Lucky Coin Flip
description: Flip a coin. If heads, draw one card. If tails, restore 5 HP.

name: Monster Sacrifice
description: Discard a Monster card from your hand. Then, search your deck for a Monster card with the same Rarity as the one you discarded and add it to your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.

name: Odd Medicine
description: Heal 1d8 damage and a condition from one of your summoned monsters. This card has no effect on undead or constructs.

name: Reckless Attack
description: Choose one of your monsters on the field. Until your next turn, that monster has advantage on melee attack rolls, but attack rolls against it have advantage.

name: Wild Shape
description: Replace one of your Beast monsters on the field with a Beast monster of the same rarity in your hand. The new monster cannot take an action until your next turn.

name: Cursed Pact
description: Choose one of your monsters on the field. It gains +4 to attack rolls but takes 1d6 necrotic damage at the start of each of your turns.

name: Dark Harvest
description: Draw a card for each Undead monster you control.

name: Final Will & Testament
description: Draw 2 cards. You can only play this card if one of your monsters died on the field last turn.

name: Fortune Teller
description: Look at the top 4 cards of your deck. Put a card you find there into your hand. Shuffle the remaining cards back into your deck.

name: Gambler
description: Shuffle your hand into your deck. Roll a d20. If you rolled higher than a 10, draw 6 cards. If you rolled lower than a 10, draw 1 card.

name: Greedy Looting
description: Draw 2 cards from your deck.

name: Luminous Crystal
description: Look at the bottom 3 cards of your deck. Put one into your hand, and put the remaining two on top of your deck in any order.

name: Magic Librarian
description: Draw a card for each Spell card in your hand.

name: Mental Reset
description: Shuffle your hand into your deck. Then, draw the same amount of cards that you had in your hand.

name: Mouth of the Beholder
description: This card is required for the activation of Eye of the Beholder. When that card is activated, discard this card. You can only have 1 copy of this card in your deck.

name: Orb of Dragonkind
description:
Choose 1:
  • Choose one of your Dragon monsters on the field. That monster gains an extra action during this turn.
  • Search your deck for a Dragon monster card and add it to your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.

name: Reanimate
description: Discard a card from your hand. Search your discard pile for any Monster card and put it in your hand.

name: Repairs
description: Choose one of your Construct Monsters on the field and heal 3d8 damage from it.

name: Rewind the Clock
description: Shuffle your discard pile into your deck.

name: Summon Greater Undead
description: Choose one Undead monster from your discard pile and summon it to the field. If it is of SR rarity or lower, it returns with full HP. If it is SSR rarity, it returns with half HP.

name: Tentacles of the Beholder
description: This card is required for the activation of Eye of the Beholder. When that card is activated, discard this card. You can only have 1 copy of this card in your deck.

name: Traveling Merchant
description: Search your deck for 2 R rarity Utility cards or 1 SR rarity Utility card and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.

name: Action Surge
description: You may take an additional action during this turn.

name: Cursed Battlefield
description: Until the end of the battle, all healing effects are halved, and all necrotic damage is doubled.

name: Eye of the Beholder
description: If you play this card without Tentacles of the Beholder and Mouth of the Beholder in your hand, this card does nothing. Make an attack that deals 12d10 true damage to a target creature.

name: Mind's Eye
description: Search your deck for a card and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.

name: The Ace Up Your Sleeve
description:
Choose 1:
  • Look at the top 5 cards of your deck. Put 2 of them into your hand, and shuffle the remaining cards into your deck.
  • When a monster on the field under your control deals damage during this turn, the attack deals an extra 6d6 damage.
  • Search your deck for a Monster or Spell card and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.
